title: WordCamp Seattle
description: Weâ€™re happy to announce that WordCamp Seattle 2016 is officially on the calendar! We’ll be at the Conference Center at the Convention Center in downtown Seattle, October 29-30, 2016. This two-day event will be $40 and include lunch vouchers to eat out in the immediate area. There’ll be lots of great speakers and topics as well as plenty of networking opportunities. We are in the early planning stages and would love your help if you’d like to volunteer.
